about_the_game:
Embrace the ultimate test of survival in our adrenaline-pumping zombie apocalypse adventure! Dive into an endless battle against relentless waves of the undead, where your skills and wits will determine your fate. Unleash your creativity as you craft an arsenal of destruction, from fiery flamethrowers that scorch the horde to explosive rocket launchers that leave nothing but chaos in their wake. Can you outlast the nightmare and rise as the ultimate zombie-slaying champion?

Build powerful weapons and defend yourself against unending hordes of undead



Explore the map to all ends to find blueprints for the strongest weapons imaginable



Fill your inventory with parts for crafting

content_descriptors.notes: There are cartoon zombies that you will fight off in this game using guns and other weapons. There is a lot of cartoon gore that appears when fighting the zombies.

short_description: They Come In Waves is an action packed FPS zombie survival game. Complete exciting quests to build your inventory and craft powerful weapons to defeat hordes of undead. Can you defeat all the bosses and save the world?
